titleStmt.title: The Christian Reader is intreated by the Author, be∣fore he reade these Treatises, to amend with his pen the faults which in his absence have escaped in the printing of them.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: The Christian Reader is intreated by the Author, be∣fore he reade these Treatises, to amend with his pen the faults which in his absence have escaped in the printing of them.

monogr.title: The covenant of grace or An exposition upon Luke 1. 73.74.75. By George Downame Doctour of Divinity, and Bishop of Dery
monogr.author: Downame, George

div.head: The Christian Reader is intreated by the Author, before he reade these Treatises, to amend with his pen the faults which in his absence have escaped in the printing of them.
div.p: The letters l. af. doe signifie, linea a fine, & there you are to reckon from the botome of the page.
